articles.title: How William Olson, Right-Wing Lawyer, Pitched Trump on a 2020 Election Plot
articles.description: The role of William J. Olson in advising the president in late 2020, which has not previously been disclosed, shows how fringe figures were influencing him at a critical time.

articles.title: Dust storm causes a 21-vehicle pileup in Montana, killing six
